content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully created a pull request for the Nx Console installation prompt simplification. Here's what was accomplished:

**PR Created**: https://github.com/nrwl/nx/pull/31532

## Summary

The changes simplify the Nx Console installation prompt by:
- Changing the title from "Enhance your developer experience with Nx Console, Nx's official editor extension" to "Install Nx's official editor extension to:"
- Removing the redundant line "Generate code and execute tasks interactively" 
- Making the message more concise and action-oriented

The pull request has been created with a proper description following the template requirements, and all validation checks have passed.
